summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2097, for the improvement of 4th Avenue Northeast, from East Green Lake Boulevard to East 75th Street, and East 75th Street, from 4th Avenue Northeast to 6th Avenue Northeast; all in the City of Seattle, by grading and curbing the same and constructing concrete sidewalks and wooden cross walks thereon, providing for the necessary surface drainage, under Ordinance No. 21191 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
